author: newsr.in
title: Former `Real Housewives of New York` star Jill Zarin hospitalised after car accident - newsR
text:
*Washington D.C., Oct. 3(ANI): Former 'Real Housewives of New York' star Jill Zarin was recently admitted to a hospital after being involved in a car accident in New York. It is being said that she is recovering now.*
Washington D.C., Oct. 3(ANI): Former 'Real Housewives of New York' star Jill Zarin was recently admitted to a hospital after being involved in a car accident in New York. It is being said that she is recovering now. According to a statement released by the actress, she was a passenger involved in a three-car pile up, reports E! Online. The statement further read that Zarin was rushed by ambulance to the hospital where she was treated for unknown injuries. Giving update on the accident, the actress' assistant tweeted, "Hi everyone this is Jill's media assistant @MaggieRey7046. Jill is doing well and resting after the car accident this morning." (ANI) Â»
